item.title: Bower manuscript story
item.description: Source: TW A 19th Century Murder that Excavated a Second-Century Sanskrit Manuscript: Episode One How the brutal murder of a 19th century British trader led to the unlikely discovery of a valuable 2nd century Sanskrit Manuscript. A Murder that Unearthed a Second-Century Sanskrit Manuscript: Episode 1 — 1 — WHAT BEGAN AS AN ARGUMENT between two businessmen led to the murder of one of them and launched a manhunt against the murderer and culminated in the accidental discovery of a 2nd Century CE Sanskrit manuscript that rattled the world of Indology in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
